meaning: 1. Amazing, Truly the best, God-tier 2. Terrible, The worst, Awful
description: 「Jue」 (绝) means 「unique, amazing」. 「Juejuezi」 is used as an adjective for extreme meanings, either 「super good」 or 「super bad」, so it must be judged from context. 「Jue le」 (绝了) means 「1. Extremely..., Amazing, Best 2. Disgusting, Annoying, Worst」.

examples.translation: After trying it, it's really incredible

examples.chinese: 你的演技绝绝子,继续加油
examples.translation: Your acting skills are god-tier, keep it up

examples.chinese: 这个电影一下子就被吸引了,尊嘟素绝绝子
examples.translation: I was immediately attracted to this movie, it's seriously the best

examples.chinese: 北京的温差绝绝子,穿短裤被冻坏了
examples.translation: The temperature difference in Beijing is terrible, I wore shorts and froze
